|{{ #widget: TagCloud

        ?? rdf:type void:Dataset .
        ?? void:classPartition ?classPartition .

}}
| {{ #widget: TagCloud
  | query = 'SELECT ?property ?entities WHERE {
        ?? rdf:type void:Dataset .
        ?? void:propertyPartition ?propertyPartition .
        ?propertyPartition void:property ?property . 
        ?propertyPartition void:entities ?entities }'
  | noDataMessage = 'There is currently no information about ontology properties available. Please calculate VoID statistics using the button above for collecting the necessary information.'
}}
|}

== Class Hierarchy ==

{{#widget: TreeResult | 
 rootNode = 
   {{ 
        query = 'SELECT DISTINCT ?class WHERE {
        ?? void:classPartition ?classPartition .
        ?classPartition void:class ?class .
      FILTER NOT EXISTS { ?class rdfs:subClassOf ?superClass }
      FILTER ( !isBLANK(?class) )}
      ORDER BY ASC(?class)'
   }} | 
 childNodes = 
   {{  
     {{
        predicate='rdfs:subClassOf' | 
        direction='IN'| 
     }}
   }} |
treeName = 'Class Hierarchy' |
  noDataMessage = 'There is currently no information about the class hierarchy available. Please calculate VoID statistics using the button above for collecting the necessary information.'
 }}

== Properties by range and domain ==

The table below lists all properties by their range and domain.

{{
#widget:TableResult|query='SELECT ?Property ?Domain ?Range WHERE {
        ?? rdf:type void:Dataset .
        ?? void:propertyPartition ?propertyPartition .
        ?propertyPartition void:property ?Property . 
      OPTIONAL { ?Property rdfs:range ?Range } 
      OPTIONAL { ?Property rdfs:domain ?Domain } }'
}}

== Triples == 

The following triples are contained in this context. Please note, that the number of triples retrieved is limited to 10,000.

{{#widget:TableResult|query='select ?s ?p ?o where { graph ?? {?s ?p ?o} } LIMIT 10000'}}
